item.title: All About the ESP32
item.description: TL/DR RX0 / TX0 are used by the onboard silabs USB/serial chip and shouldn't be used for UART in your project Pinouts / Schematics from https://randomnerdtutorials.

item.title: quick setup steps
item.description: install miniconda win6 if on a shared computer without administrative access, can be “just for me”.
